text: أَفَلَا يَتَدَبَّرُونَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانَۚ وَلَوۡ كَانَ مِنۡ عِندِ غَيۡرِ ٱللَّهِ لَوَجَدُواْ فِيهِ ٱخۡتِلَٰفٗا كَثِيرٗا

translation.en: Then do they not reflect upon the Qur'an? If it had been from [any] other than Allah, they would have found within it much contradiction
translation.id: Maka tidakkah mereka menghayati (mendalami) Alquran? Sekiranya (Alquran) itu bukan dari Allah, pastilah mereka menemukan banyak hal yang bertentangan di dalamnya
